statements: SELECT title, creator, description FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT creator, description, title FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT description, title, creator FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT title, description FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT title, creator FROM nft_metadata WHERE creator = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata WHERE title LIKE '%art%'
SELECT creator, title, description FROM nft_metadata WHERE creator = 'Bob' ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT description, creator, title FROM nft_metadata WHERE creator = 'Charlie' ORDER BY creator DESC, title ASC, description DESC
SELECT title, description FROM nft_metadata WHERE creator = 'David' AND description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT id, title, description FROM nft_metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT creator FROM nft_metadata WHERE title LIKE '%art%';
SELECT id, name FROM nft_creator WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM nft_creator WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM nft_metadata WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata WHERE creator = 'Alice';
SELECT id, name, email FROM nft_creator WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, title, creator FROM nft_metadata WHERE title LIKE '%Art%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT id, title, creator_name FROM nft_metadata ORDER BY creator_name DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM nft_metadata WHERE creator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nft_ownership;
SELECT nft_id, views_count, likes_count FROM nft_stats WHERE views_count > 100 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT title, creator_name FROM nft_metadata WHERE creator_email='example@gmail.com';
SELECT id, title, creator_name FROM nft_metadata WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM nft_ownership WHERE owner_name='Alice' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT nft_stats.nft_id, nft_metadata.title, nft_stats.views_count FROM nft_stats JOIN nft_metadata ON nft_stats.nft_id = nft_metadata.id WHERE nft_stats.views_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT title, creator_name FROM nft_metadata WHERE creator_name = 'Alice';
SELECT nft_id, description FROM nft_metadata WHERE nft_id = 'f7f99920-0e21-48bf-9aa1-1b19c7d013c0';
SELECT * FROM nft_owners WHERE owner_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT nft_id, AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM nft_ratings GROUP BY nft_id HAVING AVG(rating_value) > 4;
SELECT nft_id, title, description FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT * FROM nft_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT nft_id, AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM nft_ratings GROUP BY nft_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM nft_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT nft_id, creator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM nft_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY nft_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Metadata;
SELECT title, description FROM NFT_Metadata ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT nft_id, creator_name FROM NFT_Metadata WHERE creator_name = 'Alice';
SELECT nft_id, image_url FROM NFT_Metadata INNER JOIN NFT_Images ON NFT_Metadata.nft_id = NFT_Images.nft_id;
SELECT nft_id, tag_name FROM NFT_Metadata LEFT JOIN NFT_Tags ON NFT_Metadata.nft_id = NFT_Tags.nft_id;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Metadata;
SELECT title, description FROM NFT_Metadata WHERE nft_id = 1;
SELECT nft_id, image_url FROM NFT_Metadata JOIN NFT_Images ON NFT_Metadata.nft_id = NFT_Images.nft_id;
SELECT NFT_Owners.owner_address, NFT_Stats.views FROM NFT_Owners JOIN NFT_Stats ON NFT_Owners.nft_id = NFT_Stats.nft_id WHERE NFT_Owners.purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT NFT_Metadata.title, NFT_Tags.tag_name FROM NFT_Metadata LEFT JOIN NFT_Tags ON NFT_Metadata.nft_id = NFT_Tags.nft_id WHERE NFT_Tags.tag_name LIKE '%art%';
